QuestData.Title: Under Their Noses
QuestData.Description:
Figures they wouldn't just put the destination on the crates for us.
Nothing's ever easy, is it?
If the weapons aren't moving on Cagney's ferry, they must be passing through Bridgeport, the shipping hub just up the road.
Bridgeport is protected by a garrison of Proudmoore marines. The Ashvane Company has a lot of nerve moving illegal weapons right under their noses.
Come on, let's check it out.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Flynn Fairwind in Bridgeport.
QuestData.RewardText: <Flynn pretends not to notice you, but whispers at you.>$B$BOf course it's her.
